text: Hi Johnny, I'm glad you have your internet back, it must be a relief not to use your phone data :slightly_smiling_face:                                                                                             I agree that returning to the bedroom environment at a later time is for the best, as developing my artistic eye and portfolio skills is the priority. For my top 5 companies I would have to say they are: Supermassive Games, CD Projekt Red, Ninja Theory, Sumo Digital and Guerrilla.                                           In terms of what I would like to make I'm not entirely sure, I'm thinking either something horror themed or, if that seems too played out, a blend between fantasy/post-apocalypse. A big problem I find I have is that I'm not sure what to make to appeal to these studios so I end up abandoning environments or scenes I start

Hi ! are the companies by order of preference? We can do an horror themed or a some madmax kinda env and still stay attrative to those companies...
Im familiar with all of them, I may even have a connection or 2 that work on each.
Can you collect me some artworks of work of those companies that you love to be part of  ?

I'd say the order is more or less aligned with my preference of them, a mad max style environment could be a lot of fun. I can send you some of my favourite work from those studios sometime tomorrow afternoon, if that's okay?
of course, don't worry whenever you can
